verses.name: Mark 1:10
verses.text: And straightway coming up out of the water, he saw the heavens opened, and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him:

verses.name: Mark 1:11
verses.text: And there came a voice from heaven, saying, Thou art my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

verses.name: Mark 1:12
verses.text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness.

verses.name: Mark 1:13
verses.text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days, tempted of Satan; and was with the wild beasts; and the angels ministered unto him.

verses.name: Mark 1:14
verses.text: Now after that John was put in prison, Jesus came into Galilee, preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God,
